title: Readout of Vice President Biden’s Meeting With Ukrainian Rada Speaker Volodymyr Hroysman | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House
Office of the Vice President


For Immediate Release
December 08, 2015

 



Readout of Vice President Biden’s Meeting With Ukrainian Rada Speaker Volodymyr Hroysman





	Vice President Joe Biden met today with Ukrainian Rada Speaker Volodymyr Hroysman to discuss economic and government reforms, anti-corruption efforts, and implementation of the Minsk agreements. The Vice President expressed strong support for Ukrainian economic reforms, as welcomed the Speaker's support for constitutional amendments to reform the judiciary and empower local communities.  The two leaders also agreed on the need for Moscow to fully implement the Minsk agreements.
